name: The 340 HT
description: The 340 has voluptuous curves and are beautifully offset by clearly defined,crisp running lines that make an indelible first impression. Demonstrating Birchwoodâ€™s renowned flexibility, the 340 is available with or without a hard top, This feature allows the boat to be commissioned for pure sporting fun or with the practicality of a cockpit canopy. Below deck, a double cabin and convertible dinette sleep four in comfort while the spacious exterior includes a bathing platform and generous seating and sun lounging area. Either option provides an exhilarating ride with unrivaled comfort and accommodation.

name: Fisherman's Pride
description: A rugged fishing boat built for avid anglers and fishing enthusiasts. With its sturdy construction and specialized fishing equipment, Fisherman's Pride is designed to withstand the demands of deep-sea fishing. It features a large fishing deck, multiple rod holders, and ample storage for tackle and catch. Equipped with the latest fish-finding technology and a spacious cabin for relaxation and respite, this boat ensures an unforgettable fishing experience, whether targeting big game fish or enjoying a peaceful day on the water.

name: Sea Mist
description: A charming sailboat with a classic design that evokes a sense of timeless elegance. Sea Mist features a beautiful wooden hull and billowing white sails, capturing the essence of traditional sailing. This boat offers a spacious and cozy cabin with all the necessary amenities for a comfortable voyage. With its nimble maneuverability and gentle glide through the water, Sea Mist is perfect for those seeking a serene and romantic sailing experience along scenic coastlines or across vast oceans.

name: Thunderbolt
description: An adrenaline-pumping speedboat designed for thrill-seekers. With its bold red hull and streamlined profile, Thunderbolt is built for high-speed adventures on the water. description: A luxurious yacht with sleek lines and a pristine white exterior.
